ValidationRule.description: Opportunities designated as Self-Service (Order Source = Online) can only be set to Closed Won by System Administrators and Finance.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), TEXT(StageName) = 'CW - Closed Won', TEXT(Order_Source__c) = 'Online',
$Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'Finance Manager', NOT($User.Admin_Bypass_Validations__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunities designated as Self-Service (Order Source = Online) can only be set to Closed Won by System Administrators and Finance.
